attributes.action: A day off on your birthday or double pay.
attributes.additional_details: A gift to all those who are working so hard but also an incentive to go back to work if you're not already working.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to give workers a day off or double pay for their birthday are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
